markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Terwa Prodigy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1656)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Among the Terwa Lord clans, iruxis display immense, unrefined magical talent from a very young age. These abilities reveal themselves in a wide number of ways, but advanced spellcasting is the most common.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Lizardfolk_TerwaProdigy.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Terwa Prodigy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1656)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +17

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Iruxi](/Languages.aspx?ID=32)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +13, [Astrology Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +13, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +3

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Deep Breath** A terwa prodigy can hold their breath for 10 minutes.

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 100

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longbow_ +17 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Volley](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+5 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 24, attack +16
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2), [Pass Without Trace](/Spells.aspx?ID=215), [Swampcall](/Spells.aspx?ID=1075)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Clawsong](/Spells.aspx?ID=1066), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)
- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) (×2), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-71" />
name: Terwa Prodigy
